1632720.name: Deathbound Soundtrack - Chant of Zieminal
1632720.description:
This is Moonsailor’s prologue to the soundtrack of Deathbound, the upcoming soulslike by Trialforge Studio.

Dive into a dark, furious orchestral world in our first journey into Zieminal!

Compositions and arrangements by Rafael Langoni, Pedro Araujo, Dudu Viana

Featuring FEDERICO PUPPI, solo cello and the ST. PETERSBURG STUDIO ORCHESTRA

Mixed and mastered by Fabio Henriques and Dudu Viana
